model.environment.objects.area

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.environment.map.MapComponent
      • model.environment.objects.area.Area
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolygonShape, SimulationObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BorderControlArea, CheckInArea, CheckpointArea, EntranceArea, Facility, GateArea, OpenArea, QueuingArea, SecureArea

    public abstract class Area
extends MapComponent
implements PolygonShape
    A facility is a publicly accessible place for HumanAgents, where they can do something.
    Author:
    S.A.M. Janssen
